entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, known for his mysterious and intimidating demeanor.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend and classmate, a skilled student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, responsible for teaching Herbology.

entities.name: greenhouse
entities.description: A building at Hogwarts where plants are grown.

entities.name: flutterby bush
entities.description: A type of plant that Hermione is pruning in the greenhouse.

relationships.description: Moody gives Harry advice on how to pass the dragon in the air.
Harry asks Hermione for help with learning a Summoning Charm.
Harry needs his Firebolt to pass the dragon in the air.
Hermione is pruning a Flutterby Bush in the greenhouse.
